content.raw: Done. I've run the coverage tests myself and it seems ok. I had one unrelated isue - sometimes, `make coverage` ended with error 255 and no coverage was generated. I think this was every time except the first time. Deleting the `coverage` folder in `build` did not help, only deleting the whole build directory. Do you know why does this happen?
